app.name: TagSpaces
app.addRemoveTagsTooltip: Add or remove tags to current file selection
app.openFileNativelyTooltip: Open the current file with the default application for its file type.
app.openContainingFolderTooltip: Open the folder containing the selected file.
app.sendFileToTooltip: Send current file to another appication
app.showFilesWithThisTagTooltip: Set current tag as a filter criteria
app.moveTagToFirstPositionTooltip: Move tag to the first position
app.moveTagToLeftTooltip: Move current tag to the left
app.moveTagToRightTooltip: Move current tag to the right
app.removeTagTooltip: Remove the tag from the file
app.tagSelectedFilesTooltip: Add current tag to the selected files
app.deleteTagFromTagGroupTooltip: Delete the tag from the taggroup
app.moveTagGroupUpTooltip: Move current tag group one position up
app.moveTagGroupDownTooltip: Move current tag group one position down
app.openDirectoriyNativelyTooltip: Open current directory in the file manager
